header.title: Next generation digital banking
header.subtitle: Take your financial life online. Your Easybank account will be a one-stop-shop for spending, saving, budgeting, investing, and much more.

servizi.title: Online Banking
servizi.content: Our modern web and mobile applications allow you to keep track of your finances wherever you are in the world.

servizi.title: Simple Budgeting
servizi.content: See exactly where your money goes each month. Receive notifications when you’re close to hitting your limits.

servizi.title: Fast Onboarding
servizi.content: We don’t do branches. Open your account in minutes online and start taking control of your finances right away.

servizi.title: Open Api
servizi.content: Manage your savings, investments, pension, and much more from one account. Tracking your money has never been easier.
